body:
All,


Thanks for the help once again. After some more thought I think the perforate.cal would be great to look at, but considering rendering time (if it will even render, with as many blinds that we have to model) the better route might be the BRTD func.  I appreciate all of your help and will let you know how it works out.


Nick
___
